title: Register a private limited company online

details.description: Private company limited by shares - register a company online using model (standard) articles of association, incorporation fees and how long it takes
details.alternative_title: Incorporate a private company limited by shares
details.more_information:
It usually takes 48 hours and costs Â£15 (paid by debit or credit card or PayPal account).

You’ll need:

  • the company’s name and registered address
  • names and addresses of directors (and company secretary if you have one)
  • details of shareholders and share capital

Other ways to register

You can use form IN01 to register different types of limited companies, eg using your own articles of association or a company limited by guarantee.
details.introduction: You can register (‘incorporate’) a limited company online if it’s a private company limited by shares and you use model articles of association.
